title: Honey peanut butter cookies
ingredients: ['380g plain flour', '60g caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '65g shortening (Trex) or butter, melted', '3/4 tablespoon honey', '100g peanut butter (I use crunchy)', '2 eggs', 'caster sugar for rolling the cookies in']
